game_name: Once Upon a Sea - Eli Raz - The Prophet
game_description: “For Millennia, the Jordan river flowed into the Dead Sea undisturbed. Today the Jordan river is a polluted trickle. Industry and mining drain the lowest place on Earth’s water even further. The Dead Sea decline is triggering a catastrophic movement of underground water. As it moves it dissolves deposits under the region’s shores, leaving behind an ever growing network of dangerous sinkholes”
